text: kah do, "yadi tumhaare baap, tumhaare bete, tumhaare bhaee, tumhaaree patni yon aur tumhaare rishte-naatevaale aur maal, jo tumane kamae hai aur kaarobaar jisake manda pad jaane ka tumhen bhay hai aur ghar jinhen tum pasand karate ho, tumhe allaah aur usake rasool aur usake maarg mein jihaad karane se adhik priy hai to prateeksha karo, yahaan tak ki allaah apana faisala le aae. aur allaah avagyaakaariyon ko maarg nahin dikhaata.
